node.statement: (Well-definedness of smeared Wick powers under mu) Under the Phi^4_3 measure mu, the Wick-ordered distributions :phi^3: and :phi^2: are well-defined elements of C^{-3/2-delta}(T^3) and C^{-1-delta}(T^3) respectively, for any delta > 0. Since psi in C^inf(T^3), the pairings integral psi :phi^3: dx and integral psi^2 :phi^2: dx are well-defined real-valued random variables under mu. This follows from the regularity theory for the Phi^4_3 field (Hairer regularity structures / Gubinelli-Imkeller-Perkowski paracontrolled distributions).
